title: Why don't we translate some trending threads here?

replies.msg: This board should be used for more meaningful purposes. A lot of foreigners, especially the journalists, would like to gain some insights into LIHKG's thinking. We should utilize this opportunity to spread our messages across the world!

Absolutely

But we have to find a way to do it systematically.
But guo ng ho fan yik d yau gwan bo lik ge post, ngoi gwok yan ng jung yee
